description: Try our easy to follow Chicken Rice Paper Rolls recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rice paper rolls,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,High protein,Christmas,Wheat free,Chicken,Dairy free
name: Chicken Rice Paper Rolls Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 Lebanese cucumbers, cut into fine strips

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare noodles as per packet instructions. Rinse under cold water.
Meanwhile, remove meat from chicken, discarding skin and bones. Shred meat and set aside.
Working with 1 sheet of rice paper at a time, dip into warm water for about 10 seconds, turning until it begins to soften. Drain excess water. Lay on a clean work surface.
Place 2 mint leaves (shiny side down) 4cm in from wrapper edge closest to you. Top with some cabbage, carrot, cucumber, 2 tbs noodles and 2 tbs shredded chicken.
Fold base and sides of wrapper over filling, place 2-3 mint leaves (shiny side down) and a few chives and roll up firmly to enclose. Transfer to a plate and cover with a damp cloth, then repeat.
For dipping sauce, combine all ingredients with 1/4 cup water and mix well. Cut rolls in half. Serve with sauce.
